short_summary: Source Professional Audit Support Services Stream 1: Internal and External Audits
description: This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide professional audit support services to Natural Resources Canada.
full_summary:
**Tender for Professional Audit Support Services**
=====================================================

### Solicitation Summary

**PW-22-01018111**, amendment 1 - Professional Audit Support Services for Natural Resources Canada.

#### Procurement
---------------

- **Solicitation #:** NRCan-5000071774
- **Issue date:** December 20, 2022
- **Closing date:** January 18, 2023, at 14:00 EST
- **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Description
---------------

The Government of Canada, through Natural Resources Canada, is seeking proposals for professional audit support services. This procurement is conducted through a request for proposal.

#### Key Dates
-------------

- **Posting date:** December 20, 2022
- **Closure date:** January 18, 2023
- **Expected start date:** To be determined

#### Required Services
---------------------

- Provide professional audit support services to Natural Resources Canada
- Services may be provided on-premises or remote

#### Eligibility
-------------

This procurement is open to organizations wishing to provide audit services. Please refer to the attached documents for eligibility criteria and requirements.

#### Procedures
-------------

Prospective bidders should visit the inCoubIdears Government Buy and Sell website for complete guidelines and requirements. Submit your proposal electronically by the specified deadline to be eligible to participate in the evaluation process.

#### Contact Information
---------------------

For more information or to request access to the solicitation documents, please contact Daniel Burley at 343-543-7809 ([daniel.burley@canada.ca](mailto:daniel.burley@canada.ca)) or visit the inCoubIdears Government Buy and Sell website for more information.

#### Attachments
----------------

Download the solicitation documents from the following links:

- English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/72e7411896e503b46454e8277e5b1fe0/npp_pass_nrcan-5000071774_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/72e7411896e503b46454e8277e5b1fe0/npp_pass_nrcan-5000071774_en.pdf)
- French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/b
